eas_text: A civil authority has issued A MISSING AND ENDANGERED PERSON ALERT for the following counties or areas: Maricopa; Gila, AZ; at 08:10 PM ON JAN 13, 2026 Effective until 06:10 AM JAN 14, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety.  A Turquoise Alert has been issued for Avondale Police Department. The Avondale Police Department is looking for 21-year-old, Isabella Comas. Isabella is a Hispanic female, 5 feet 3 inches tall, 110 pounds, with brown eyes and pink hair. She was last seen wearing a baggy navy-blue shirt, blue pants with a white line going down the side of them and possibly wearing sandals. Isabella was last seen driving a red 2011 Hyundai Sonata bearing an Arizona license plate 2EA6LW.

If you have contact with the missing person. please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
